azurerm_key_vault_access_policy.description: Manages a Key Vault Access Policy.

key_vault_id.description: Specifies the id of the Key Vault resource. Changing this

tenant_id.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant ID that should be used

object_id.description: The object ID of a user, service principal or security

application_id.description: The object ID of an Application in Azure Active Directory.

certificate_permissions.description: List of certificate permissions, must be one or more from

key_permissions.description: List of key permissions, must be one or more from

secret_permissions.description: List of secret permissions, must be one or more

storage_permissions.description: List of storage permissions, must be one or more from the following: `backup`, `delete`, `deletesas`, `get`, `getsas`, `list`, `listsas`, `purge`, `recover`, `regeneratekey`, `restore`, `set`, `setsas` and `update`.

create.description: Used when creating the Key Vault Access Policy.

update.description: Used when updating the Key Vault Access Policy.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Key Vault Access Policy.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Key Vault Access Policy.
